title: How to Eat Smarter & Use the Power of Food to Reboot Your Metabolism, Upgrade Your Brain, and Transform Your Life (with Shawn Stevenson)
description:
Early bird tickets on sale now for my 2021 Mental Health Retreat: https://www.drleafconference.com

Get a free Cleaning up your Mental Mess workbook when you sign up for my weekly newsletter at drleaf.com


SHOW DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk to Shawn Stevenson, creator of The Model Health Show, one of the top health and fitness podcasts, and author of the bestselling book Eat Smarter. We speak about so many things, including the role of the mind in healing the body, food as information, and why we need to make real food accessible to all.

Get Shawn's book here: https://eatsmarterbook.com

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/how-to-eat-smarter-use-the-power-of-food-to-reboot-your-metabolism-upgrade-your-brain-transform-your-life


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS:

-Plushcare: Go to https://plushcare.com/drleaf/ to start your FREE 30-day trial.

-Ana Luisa Jewelry: I LOVE them, their pieces start at just $39, and you can get 20% off with their summer sale at https://shop.analuisa.com/drleaf!

-Ritual: Get 10% off during your first 3 months. Just visit ritual.com/DRLEAF to add Essential Protein today. That’s ritual.com/DRLEAF.


PODCAST HIGHLIGHTS:

2:45 Shawn’s amazing story

10:00 The incredible healing power of the brain & body

19:00 The difference between the mind & brain, plus why this difference is intrinsically hopeful

21:10 How our lowest points in life can lead to moments of transformation

24:40 How Shawn changed his lifestyle & learned how to manage and heal his body

25:30 Why Shawn wrote Eat Smarter

26:50 Why real, life-sustaining foods should be more accessible & available for everyone

35:15 Shawn’s work as a health coach

36:00 The difference between being healthy & weight loss

48:00 Why the mind is so important when it comes to what we eat & how healthy we are

48:45, 1:01:20 The gut-brain connection & the importance of a healthy microbiome


-Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

-Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app

-Sign up to join my free text program and receive mental health care tips. Just text DRLEAF to 1 (833) 285 3747

-Facebook: Dr. Caroline Leaf: https://www.facebook.com/drleaf

-Twitter: @drcarolineleaf: https://twitter.com/DrCarolineLeaf
